sentences.en: 'Oh! if you come to prosperous, you are prosperous,'said Mr. Lorry.
sentences.cn: “ 啊, 要说发达么, 你倒也是的, ” 罗瑞先生说.

sentences.en: After their misfortunes the family slowly became prosperous.
sentences.cn: 灾难过后,他们家又慢慢地兴盛起来.

sentences.en: But often their children managed to have more prosperous lives.
sentences.cn: 但通常他们的孩子成功地过上了富足得多的生活.

sentences.en: It is a prosperous voyage to the ship.
sentences.cn: 这是那艘船的一次成功的航行.

sentences.en: It is our belief that improvements in health care will lead to a stronger, more prosperous economy.
sentences.cn: 我们坚信，改善医疗保健会使经济更加繁荣昌盛。

sentences.en: It used to be a very prosperous town.
It's a fallacy that the affluent give relatively more to charity than the less prosperous.
sentences.cn: 富人比穷人对慈善事业的捐助更多些；这种观点是一种谬见。

sentences.en: Some people become prosperous sooner than others.
Suburbs sprawled out to provide homes for the newly prosperous.
sentences.cn: 市郊无规划地向外扩展以为新近富起来的人提供住房.

sentences.en: The city is becoming more and more prosperous.
sentences.cn: 这个城市越来越繁盛了.

sentences.en: The country is prosperous and the people live in peace.
The division between the prosperous west and the impoverished east remains.
sentences.cn: 繁荣的西部和贫穷的东部之间的差距仍然存在。

sentences.en: The peasant household has become prosperous through working hard.
sentences.cn: 这户农家已经通过勤劳变得兴旺发达了.

sentences.en: The place looks more prosperous than ever.
This district is getting more and more prosperous and bustling.

trans.tran_cn: 繁荣的，兴旺的，富裕的，幸福的，运气好的，良好的
